trans-unit.source: Defines an installer that either succeeds completely or fails and leaves the computer in its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 定义的安装程序是完全成功或失败和导致计算机处于其初始状态。

trans-unit.source: To run installers in a transaction, add them to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property of this TransactedInstaller instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要在事务中运行安装程序，将其添加到<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>此 TransactedInstaller 实例的属性。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller"></xref> class.
This method calls the Install method of each installer contained in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用中包含每个安装程序的安装方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>的此实例的属性。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object referenced by the `savedState` parameter is updated to reflect the status of the installation after the contained installers have run.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>所引用对象`savedState`参数更新以反映安装状态，包含的安装程序都运行后。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: If all the Install methods succeed, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有安装方法都成功，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> method is called for each installer.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>对于每个安装程序中调用方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> in which this method saves information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>在此方法保存执行提交、 所需的信息回滚或卸载操作。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The savedState parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The savedState parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The installation failed, and is being rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 安装失败，并且正在回滚。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to remove a previously completed installation.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以删除以前完成的安装。

trans-unit.source: This Uninstall method calls the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method of each installer in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property to uninstall any resources set during installation.
trans-unit.target: 此卸载方法调用<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法中的每个安装程序<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>在安装期间设置的属性来卸载任何资源。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions during uninstallation are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 卸载过程中的任何异常将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 尽管<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>方法保存的安装后的计算机的状态文件包含<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>从`savedState`参数可能已删除在某个时间点之后安装已完成。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除文件时，`savedState`参数是`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the state of the computer after the installation completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含在安装完成后计算机的状态。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
